dc_title_s: Duche de Bretaigne; dessigné par le Sieur Hardy.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Decorative cartouche, coat of arms with sea monsters, and ships. Includes the inscription "et se vendent aussy a Paris chez Melchoir Tavernier demeurant sur l'isle du Palais a la Sphere." 1 map; 36 x 49 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Hardy, Claude, d. 1678, engraver.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Atlantis Maioris Appendix, 1630.,Hondius, Hendrik, 1597-1651, cartographer.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.,Tavernier, Melchior, -1641, vendor.
